Content: *p70971a01028*10	  13	 some particle physics experiments use electrons which are accelerated to very high energies by a linac. the diagram shows the first section of the linac.             a.c. supplyelectron sourcetubeelectron path	 *(a)	explain why the distances between consecutive tubes increase in the first section of the linac but are almost equally spaced in the last section of the linac.(6)

Title: June 2022
Content: *p70971a01628*16	  16	 in the early 20th century, experiments were carried out in which alpha particles were directed towards thin gold foil.	a simplified diagram of the apparatus used is shown.                 detectorvacuumgold foillead boxalpha particle source	(a)	 state three observations and the corresponding conclusions made from the alpha particle scattering experiment.(6)
